name: Mighty Fleet Power Movers 15” Interactive Police Car Toy – Motion Drive Motorized Action, Flashing Lights & Siren, Working Spotlight, Batteries Included, Kids Ages 3 +
short_description: Interactive Motion Drive – Large shift knob activates motorized forward chase action and revving sounds, putting kids in full control of the pursuit.
Lights, Siren & Working Spotlight – Flashing police bars, realistic siren/engine effects, and an adjustable spotlight turn backyards into crime‑scene adventures.
Big 15‑Inch Cruiser Built Tough – Durable plastic body and free‑rolling wheels stand up to driveway races, carpet patrols, and sandbox stake‑outs.
Ready Right Out of the Box – Comes with 3 AA batteries already installed—just remove the try‑me tab and start the lights‑and‑sounds action.
Kid‑Approved Fun – Designed for ages 3‑8, pairs perfectly with other Mighty Fleet vehicles for epic rescue play.
product_description: Answer the call with the Mighty Fleet Power Movers Police Car—an over‑sized 15‑inch cruiser packed with flashing lights, blaring siren, and a real working spotlight for nighttime patrols. Motion Drive Technology lets young officers twist the shift knob to send the car racing forward with roaring engine sounds, then hit the brakes to trigger reverse alerts. Crafted from heavy‑duty plastic and rolling on smooth‑glide wheels, this cruiser handles kitchen‑tile chases as easily as outdoor stakeouts. Pre‑installed batteries mean the action starts the moment it’s out of the box, making it an instant win for birthdays, holidays, or “just‑because” surprises. Add it to the Mighty Fleet Power Movers lineup—tow truck, garbage truck, and more—for a full squad ready to save the day. Appropriate for children ages 3 and up.

name: Hot Wheels Toy Car Track Set, City Downtown Police Tower Playset & 1:64 Scale Die-Cast Police Vehicle, Expands to 3 Levels, Speed Snap Track System
short_description: ​Explore the Hot Wheels City Downtown Police Tower that expands to 3 levels and drives storytelling adventures.
​Take the kid-powered elevator to the second floor, where there's a choice of exit paths: Speed down the ramp through the side exit or hit the stop-sign diverter to exit out the ground-floor door.
​Pull up on the Hot Wheels sign to reveal the lookout station. Cars can park here until called to action and keep watch over Hot Wheels City through the translucent red and blue windows.
​The base of the set features push-around play details like a gas tank with a movable hose, a working door and a drive-through ramp.
​The set includes Speed Snap Track System connection points that allow kids to attach additional tracks or playsets for open-ended play.
product_description: The Hot Wheels City Downtown Police Tower Playset expands to include three levels of kid-favorite features like ramps, diverters and realistic track-play details. Pull up to the tower and gas up the included 1:64 scale toy car with the movable hose. Head inside and take the elevator up a floor to choose one of two paths: launch down the ramp through the side or hit the stop-sign diverter and speed through the garage. On the top level, the translucent windows make a perfect site for lookouts and storage. The set includes Speed Snap Track connection points so that kids can connect it to other Hot Wheels or Matchbox sets or tracks. Additional track sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.
